00001 /* double (precision) TRiangular Matrices */

00003 #include "dtrMatrix.h"

00005 SEXP triangularMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00006 {
00007     SEXP val = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym);
00008 
00009     if (LENGTH(val) < 2)
00010         return mkString(_("'Dim' slot has length less than two"));
00011     if (INTEGER(val)[0] != INTEGER(val)[1])
00012         return mkString(_("Matrix is not square"));
00013     if (isString(val = check_scalar_string(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_uploSym),
00014                                            "LU", "uplo"))) return val;
00015     if (isString(val = check_scalar_string(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_diagSym),
00016                                            "NU", "diag"))) return val;
00017     return ScalarLogical(1);
00018 }
00019 
00020 SEXP dtrMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00021 {
00022     /* since "dtr" inherits from "triangular", and "dMatrix", only need this:*/
00023     return dense_nonpacked_validate(obj);
00024 }

00027 static
00028 double get_norm(SEXP obj, const char *typstr)
00029 {
00030     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00031     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00032     double *work = (double *) NULL;
00033 
00034     typnm[0] = norm_type(typstr);
00035     if (*typnm == 'I') {
00036         work = (double *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(double));
00037     }
00038     return F77_CALL(dlantr)(typnm, uplo_P(obj), diag_P(obj), dims, dims+1,
00039                             REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)), dims, work);
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 SEXP dtrMatrix_norm(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00044 {
00045     return ScalarReal(get_norm(obj, CHAR(asChar(type))));
00046 }
00047 
00048 SEXP dtrMatrix_rcond(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00049 {
00050     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00051     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00052     double rcond;
00053 
00054     typnm[0] = rcond_type(CHAR(asChar(type)));
00055     F77_CALL(dtrcon)(typnm, uplo_P(obj), diag_P(obj), dims,
00056                      REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)), dims, &rcond,
00057                      (double *) R_alloc(3*dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00058                      (int *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(int)), &info);
00059     return ScalarReal(rcond);
00060 }
00061 
00062 SEXP dtrMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00063 {
00064     SEXP val = PROTECT(duplicate(a));
00065     int info, *Dim = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00066     F77_CALL(dtrtri)(uplo_P(val), diag_P(val), Dim,
00067                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), Dim, &info);
00068     UNPROTECT(1);
00069     return val;
00070 }
00071 
00072 SEXP dtrMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00073 {
00074     SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00075     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00076         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00077     int n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1];
00078     double one = 1.0;
00079 
00080     if (*adims != *bdims || bdims[1] < 1 || *adims < 1 || *adims != adims[1])
00081         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00082     F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", uplo_P(a), "N", diag_P(a),
00083                     &n, &nrhs, &one, REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), &n,
00084                     REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)), &n);
00085     UNPROTECT(1);
00086     return ans;
00087 }
00088 
00089 SEXP dtrMatrix_matrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP right)
00090 {
00091     /* Because a must be square, the size of the answer, val,
00092      * is the same as the size of b */
00093     SEXP val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00094     int rt = asLogical(right); /* if(rt), compute b %*% a,  else  a %*% b */
00095     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00096         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00097     int m = bdims[0], n = bdims[1];
00098     double one = 1.;
00099 
00100     if (adims[0] != adims[1])
00101         error(_("dtrMatrix in %*% must be square"));
00102     if ((rt && adims[0] != n) || (!rt && adims[1] != m))
00103         error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00104     if (m < 1 || n < 1)
00105         error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied"));
00106     F77_CALL(dtrmm)(rt ? "R" : "L", uplo_P(a), "N", diag_P(a), &m, &n, &one,
00107                     REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), adims,
00108                     REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &m);
00109     UNPROTECT(1);
00110     return val;
00111 }
00112 
00113 SEXP dtrMatrix_as_matrix(SEXP from, SEXP keep_dimnames)
00114 {
00115     int *Dim = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym));
00116     int m = Dim[0], n = Dim[1];
00117     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, m, n));
00118     make_d_matrix_triangular(Memcpy(REAL(val),
00119                                     REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), m * n),
00120                              from);
00121     if(asLogical(keep_dimnames))
00122         setAttrib(val, R_DimNamesSymbol, GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00123     UNPROTECT(1);
00124     return val;
00125 }
00126 
00127 #define GET_trMatrix_Diag(_C_TYPE_, _SEXPTYPE_, _SEXP_, _ONE_)          \
00128     int i, n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym))[0];                  \
00129     SEXP x_x = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym);                                \
00130                                                                         \
00131     SEXP ret = PROTECT(allocVector(_SEXPTYPE_, n));                     \
00132     _C_TYPE_ *rv = _SEXP_(ret),                                         \
00133              *xv = _SEXP_(x_x);                                         \
00134                                                                         \
00135     if ('U' == diag_P(x)[0]) {                                          \
00136         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) rv[i] = _ONE_;                          \
00137     } else {                                                            \
00138         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) rv[i] = xv[i * (n + 1)];                \
00139     }                                                                   \
00140     UNPROTECT(1);                                                       \
00141     return ret
00142 
00143 
00144 SEXP dtrMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x) {
00145     GET_trMatrix_Diag(double, REALSXP, REAL, 1.);
00146 }
00147 
00148 SEXP ltrMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x) {
00149     GET_trMatrix_Diag(  int, LGLSXP, LOGICAL, 1);
00150 }

00153 SEXP dtrMatrix_dgeMatrix_mm_R(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00154 {
00155     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00156         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimSym)),
00157         m = adims[0], n = bdims[1], k = adims[1];
00158     SEXP val = PROTECT(duplicate(b));
00159     double one = 1.;
00160 
00161     if (bdims[0] != k)
00162         error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00163     if (m < 1 || n < 1 || k < 1)
00164         error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied"));
00165     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", uplo_P(a), "N", diag_P(a), adims, bdims+1, &one,
00166                     REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), adims,
00167                     REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), bdims);
00168     UNPROTECT(1);
00169     return val;
00170 }
00171 
00172 SEXP dtrMatrix_as_dtpMatrix(SEXP from)
00173 {
00174     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtpMatrix"))),
00175         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00176         diag = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_diagSym),
00177         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym);
00178     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00179 
00180     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00181     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, duplicate(diag));
00182     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00183     full_to_packed_double(
00184         REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, (n*(n+1))/2)),
00185         REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00186         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW,
00187         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(diag, 0)) == 'U' ? UNT : NUN);
00188     UNPROTECT(1);
00189     return val;
00190 }
